channel.title: Error in Run.bat Repp ++
channel.description: [code][1/8/12 2:03 PM]: java.lang.NullPointerException [1/8/12 2:03 PM]: at server.clip.region.ObjectDef.getObjectDef(ObjectDef.j ava:9) [1/8/12 2:03 PM]: at server.clip.region.Region.addObject(Region.java:255) [1/8/12 2:03 PM]: at server.model.players.PlayerAssistant.checkObjectSpawn (PlayerAssistant.java:588) [1/8/12 2:03 PM]: at server.world.ObjectManager.loadCustomSpawns(ObjectMan ager.java:94) [1/8/12 2:03 PM]: at server.world.ObjectManager.loadObjects(ObjectManager. java:84) [1/8/12 2:03 PM]: at server.model.players.packets.ChangeRegions.processPac ket(ChangeRegions.java:16) [1/8/12 2:03 PM]: at server.model.players.PacketHandler.processPacket(Pack etHandler.java:139) [1/8/12 2:03 PM]: at server.model.players.Client.processQueuedPackets(Clie nt.java:887) [1/8/12 2:03 PM]: at server.model.players.PlayerHandler.process(PlayerHand ler.java:136) [1/8/12 2:03 PM]: at server.Server.main(Server.java:136) [1/8/12 2:03 PM]: java.lang.NullPointerException [1/8/12 2:03 PM]: at server.clip.region.ObjectDef.getObjectDef(ObjectDef.j ava:9) [1/8/12 2:03 PM]: at server.clip.region.Region.addObject(Region.java:255) [1/8/12 2:03 PM]: at server.model.players.PlayerAssistant.checkObjectSpawn (PlayerAssistant.java:588) [1/8/12 2:03 PM]: at server.world.ObjectManager.loadCustomSpawns(ObjectMan ager.java:94) [1/8/12 2:03 PM]: at server.world.ObjectManager.loadObjects(ObjectManager. java:84) [1/8/12 2:03 PM]: at server.model.players.packets.ChangeRegions.processPac ket(ChangeRegions.java:16) [1/8/12 2:03 PM]: at server.model.players.PacketHandler.processPacket(Pack etHandler.java:139) [1/8/12 2:03 PM]: at server.model.players.Client.processQueuedPackets(Clie nt.java:887) [1/8/12 2:03 PM]: at server.model.players.PlayerHandler.process(PlayerHand ler.java:136) [1/8/12 2:03 PM]: at server.Server.main(Server.java:136)[/code] This happens in my Run.bat I even tryed taking my clip folder out but this still happens, can someone make any suggestions for a Rep++.
